summary: It's the year 3000 A.D., and the Earth is lost to the alien race of Psychlos. Humanity is enslaved by these gold-thirsty tyrants, who are unaware that their 'man-animals' are about to ignite the rebellion of a lifetime.
cast: John Travolta|Barry Pepper|Forest Whitaker|Kim Coates|Sabine Karsenti|Michael Byrne|Christian Tessier|Sylvain Landry|Richard Tyson|Christopher Freeman|John Topor|Shaun Austin-Olsen|Tim Post|Earl Pastko|Michel Perron|Michael MacRae|Todd McDougall|Derrick Damon Reeve|Jason Cavalier|Sean Hewitt|Andrew Albert|Alan Legros|Andy Bradshaw|Jim Meskimen|Robert Higden|Rejean Denoncourt|Tait Ruppert|Mulumba Tshikuka|Kelly Preston|Marie-Jos√©e Croze|Nadine Corde|Russell Yuen|Andrew Campbell|Noel Burton|Craig Gauthier|Jared Labelle
title: Campo de batalla: La Tierra
